Plot
Two girls, two half-sisters aged eight and thirteen. The younger of the two lives with her rich parents, she has extra tutors, music lessons. The older sister lives with her grandmother, and she has to show a maturity beyond her years. When the father of the younger one runs into serious trouble, a rival group of gangsters begins an all-out manhunt for the younger sister. And the only person there to help her is her older sister...
